metadata.synopsis: The player characters comment on how the weapon puzzle  in the Abbot's room accepts any weapon of the correct type, not just the ceremonial weapons.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Place a correct generic weapon on an altar in the Weapons puzzle in the Monastery of Lathander (CRE_Main_A) (can teleport to Abbot's Room in the debug book). Note: it will not trigger if a ceremonial weapon is used.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like any regular weapons I have work here too.
